messages.content: Recently I gave you a leaflet to introduce myself and now I would like to tell you what I want to achieve, as your MP.

issues.brexitEurope: I will resist any effort to reduce the UK's sovereignty; this may mean opposing the European Union but also any other nation that seeks to impose its will on the British people.
issues.immigration: Please contact me on mobile: 07850 269424 or via email: stuart.agnew@btconnect.com, to arrange this.

housing.content: I would champion causes that are being ignored; such as housing for local families, frequency of buses and homecare for the elderly and other issues, as they arise.

politicalExperience.achievements: I have already researched and solved many issues for Norfolk constituents (see my website and look at 'Research Centre' for many examples).

images.caption: Stuart Agnew MEP in the Strasbourg Parliament
